meanings.sent1: My forebear was a brave warrior who fought in many battles.
meanings.sent2: I am proud of my forebear's heritage and the legacy they left behind.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, we all shared stories about our forebears and their adventures.
meanings.sent4: The roots of our family tree run deep, connecting us to our forebears who paved the way.
meanings.sent5: Learning about our forebears helps us understand where we come from and who we are.

meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization forebore the modern cities we see today.
meanings.sent2: Before the invention of smartphones, simpler communication methods forebore.
meanings.sent3: The old clock in the town square seemed to forebear the passage of time with its steady ticking.
meanings.sent4: The first light of dawn forebore the start of a new day filled with possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The falling leaves forebear the arrival of autumn, painting the trees in vibrant colors.
